features: 【Multifunctional Bookshelf Organizer】There are 3 storage areas of this tree bookshelf that can store your books, decorations, CDs, movies and video games. Combined tree shaped design and vintage color, our small bookshelf is not only a bookcase but also a decoration that can be placed in the bedroom, living room ,study room or office, fitting most home decor styles.

【Sturdy Design】The desktop bookshelf adopts the geometric T-shaped design for offering the most stable support. Besides, this tree bookshelf is equipped with the anti-toppling device that offer additional stability.

【Space Saving】Sized at 11.8"L x 7.1"W x 16.1"H, this 3-tier bookshelf organizer can hold 5-10 books each shelf and with 22lbs load capacity of each storage rack. With the tree design and small footprint, this small bookshelf is ideal for corners and small spaces.

【Safe to Use】The tree bookshelf is made of 12mm high-quality particle board and with backboard reinforcement dedsign to provide great stability and durability. Besides, our desktop bookshelf meets the EPA TSCA Title VI and Carb Certification, which can offer you a safe, healthy storage space in your room.

【Worry-free Purchase】Easy-to-follow instructions, numbered parts and assembly tools are all included in the package, allowing you to assemble this tree bookshelf organizer quickly and easily. We provide 12 months warranty and lifetime customer support for this small bookshelf. Any quality problems about the desktop bookshelf, please feel free to contact us at any time.
body.description: Tajsoon Tree Bookshelf Refreshes Your Home With a tree-branch structure, this small bookshelf is perfect for limited spaces like offices, living rooms, bedrooms, apartments, narrow corridors, classrooms, kids’ rooms, entryways,s or corners. This small bookcase offers 3 tiers of open shelves that provide ample space for books, CDs, DVDs, photos, and ornaments. Artistic design and exquisite workmanship making your house more attractive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect shelf for my all my books! Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Review: TAJSOON Mini Tree Bookshelf
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my bedside table to organize my current reads. You do need to assemble this bookshelf. They include an allen wrench with a handle which was fantastic! They did not include a Philips head screwdriver so you will need one from your own toolbox. It took me 25 minutes to assemble the shelf. Most of the predrilled holes lined up, but the back piece and bottom piece needed slight maneuvering to make sure all the screws got in the right spot. I like the color and the pieces are smooth. The tree looks like three shelves, but it's more like 2 shelves to hold items. I consider it a statement piece rather than a full organizational piece. I'd give this a 3.5 out of 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, minimalistic shelf
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice bookshelf. It's tiny yet holds the right amount of books maybe even good for your kindle, iPad and/or nook !! Nice and simple easy to assemble worth it !!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My books never were so organized
reviews.reviewText: This tree bookshelf is amazing. It's not to small and not to big and what's more important is that all my books fit perfectly in it.Very happy with this purchase 😀 😊

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Sturdy, Tabletop Book Organizer
reviews.reviewText: The Tajsoon 3 Tier Tree Bookshelf was delivered as described, meeting my expectations. This is not a large piece of furniture -- its three shelves each will hold a few small books or notepads. This is appropriate for use as an organizer to place on a desktop or another piece of furniture. It is not solid hardwood -- it is plywood or particle board of some sort, but it did not have the typical bad smell of MDF, so it is perfectly fine. The wood grain on the surface is well stained and attractive.The key challenge with this type of purchase always is the assembly process. This one took about 20 minutes. The written instructions were fine, and the pieces lined up and fit together as they were supposed to, which is always a relief. The joints are square, the screw holes lined up with each other (after minimal forcing), etc. -- that's really all you can ask for in a product like this. A special octagonal-head screw driver was included, but you will also need a Phillips head to complete assembly.In conclusion, if you're looking for a Three-tier Tree bookshelf, the Tajsoon seems to be a good option and a reasonable value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Desktop Bookshelf
reviews.reviewText: I got this because I have some books I have on my desk that I like to keep for reference. I thought this would be a good way to keep them organized. It looks fantastic and easily holds I few hefty books. However, I would make sure that your desk is sturdy because the shelf itself is a little heavy. It is also very easy to put together. Overall, I am very pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Stickers are terrible to get off
reviews.reviewText: This would be a decent product if they didn't have stickers on every piece that are impossible to get off. I had to scrape each sticker off (which took for ever) and the glue won't come off. The placement of the stickers is visible and can see the remnant of the glue.
